title: Taco Bell's Quesalupa Review - Kinda Funny Unboxings
description:
Get everything early here: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here http://www.ORIGINPC.com.


Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Each and every Friday, Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Nick Scarpino, and Tim Gettys get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys this is Nick Scarpino, Nick Scarpino on Twitter, so here's the deal, Nick, yes, couple days ago Taco Bell comes out of nowhere on the social medias, on the twitters as they normally do, blowing our minds, they come out and they're like hey we're going to unveil the biggest thing ever, do you want to pre-order it, and I'm like oh Taco Bell I love you I do want to pre-order yes I want to pre-order it so I pre-ordered five and that's how that thing works my favorite thing was that this this this uh process was so well planned that when we walked into the Taco Bells get the person that was serving us had no idea what we were talking about no idea at all now here's the thing Nick here's here's the thing that's even deeper than this it was an online pre-order you have to make your account its for the online ordering now there's no Taco Bell in San Francisco that does online ordering so that was my issue where I'm like well I guess we can't officially do this so going in I
